title: Welcome Screen - Elements exist
custom_preconds: Given a user has not gone through onboarding they should see a welcome screen with some introductory text and a button to go to the next view
custom_steps:
- Fresh App launch 
- View welcome screen
custom_expected: Welcome screen should have a next button

title: Teams - Elements exist
custom_steps:
- Open the app with a fresh install
- Navigate past welcome screen
custom_expected: All MLB teams are present for selection

title: Teams - User can add teams
custom_steps:
- Open the app on a fresh install
- Navigate past the welcome screen
- Add the Orioles as a favorite team
- Remove the Orioles as a favorite team
custom_expected: A team can be added and removed from the team selection view

title: Teams - User can remove teams
custom_steps:
- Open the app on a fresh install
- Navigate past the welcome screen
- Add the Orioles as a favorite team
- Remove the Orioles as a favorite team
custom_expected: A team can be removed from the team selection view

title: Push Notifications - Default elements exist
custom_steps:
- Open the app for a fresh install
- Navigate past welcome
- Navigate past teams without selecting teams
custom_expected: Push notifications view should show a welcome text, an MLB section header and a news subscription

title: Push Notifications - Selected team elements exist
custom_steps:
- Open the app on a fresh install
- Navigate to teams
- Select the braves then red sox as favorite teams
- Navigate to push notifications
custom_expected:
Push notifications view should show a welcome text, an MLB section header and a news subscription 

Braves and Red Sox are shown with the following selections:
Game Start: selected
Lead change: deselected
Score change: selected
Pitching change: deselected
Game end: selected
In-Game Video Highlights: selected
News: selected

title: Push Notifications - Correctly shows loading state
custom_steps:
Open the app on a fresh install
Navigate through welcome
Navigate to teams
Turn on Airplane mode
Press "Next" to move to push notification preferences
custom_expected: Observe that an ActivityIndicator is showing on the screen

title: Push Notifications - Displays alert on load failure
custom_steps:
Open the app on a fresh install
Navigate through welcome
Navigate to teams
Turn on Airplane mode
Press "Next" to move to push notification preferences
custom_expected: Notifications should show a loading state and eventually display an Alert asking to "Try Again" or "Set Up Later"

title: Push Notifications - Retry load eventually succeeds
custom_steps:
Open the app on a fresh install
Navigate through welcome
Navigate to teams
Turn on Airplane mode
Press "Next" to move to push notification preferences
Wait for Alert to display
Turn off Airplane mode
Tap "Try Again"
custom_expected: Notification preferences appear

title: Push Notifications - Set Up Later from load advances to paywall
custom_steps:
Open the app on a fresh install
Navigate through welcome
Navigate to teams
Turn on Airplane mode
Press "Next" to move to push notification preferences
Wait for Alert to display
Turn off Airplane mode
Tap "Set Up Later"
custom_expected: Paywall is displayed

title: Push Notifications - Displays alert on save failure
custom_steps:
Open the app on a fresh install
Navigate through welcome
Navigate to teams
Press "Next" to move to push notification preferences
Turn on Airplane mode
Tap "Next" to save preferences
custom_expected: Notifications should show a loading state and eventually display an Alert asking to "Try Again" or "Set Up Later"

title: Push Notifications - Retry save eventually succeeds
custom_steps:
Open the app on a fresh install
Navigate through welcome
Navigate to teams
Press "Next" to move to push notification preferences
Turn on Airplane mode
Tap "Next" to save preferences
Wait for Alert to display
Turn off Airplane mode
Tap "Try Again"
custom_expected: Paywall is displayed

title: Push Notifications - Set Up Later from save advances to paywall
custom_steps:
Open the app on a fresh install
Navigate through welcome
Navigate to teams
Press "Next" to move to push notification preferences
Turn on Airplane mode
Tap "Next" to save preferences
Wait for Alert to display
Turn off Airplane mode
Tap "Set Up Later"
custom_expected: Paywall is displayed

title: Paywall - Elements exist for unauthenticated user
custom_steps:
- Open the app on a fresh install
- Navigate through welcome
- Navigate through teams
- Navigate through push
custom_expected: Paywall should be shown for unauthenticated users and render with expected elements

title: Completion - Shows default tab with no team selected
custom_preconds:
- Fresh install
- Scores has been set to default tab
custom_steps:
- Install app
- Navigate through welcome
- Navigate through teams
- Navigate through push notifications
- Navigate through paywall
custom_expected: Scores should be selected as the default tab

title: Completion - Shows favorite team tab
custom_steps:
- Install app
- Navigate through welcome
- Select Orioles then Red Sox as favorite teams
- Navigate through teams
- Navigate through push notifications
- Navigate through paywall
custom_expected: Selected tab in the main tab bar is the Orioles

title: Config- Onboarding skipped if flag is set to "never"
custom_preconds:
- Fresh install
- Feature flag in app config: onboarding.showOnboarding is set to "never"
- Scores is set to default tab
custom_steps: - Open the app
custom_expected: Onboarding is skipped and scores tab is shown

title: Paywall - Skips paywall for mlb.tv entitled user
custom_preconds:
- User is logged in with an account that has MLB.tv subscription
- Scoreboard is set to first tab
- Onboarding is triggered
custom_steps:
- Install app
- Navigate through welcome
- Navigate through teams
- Navigate through push notifications
custom_expected: Paywall should not be shown and user should see the tab bar with the scores tab selected

title: Teams - Preselected teams are populated
custom_preconds:
- Onboarding is reset
- User has set favorite teams of Mets and Angels
custom_steps:
- Open the app
- Navigate through the welcome screen
custom_expected: Mets and Angels should be preselected as favorite teams

title: Welcome - All elements appear correctly when user is not logged in and has no shared credentials
Welcome - All elements appear correctly when user is not logged in and has shared credentials
Welcome - All elements appear correctly when user is logged in and has no shared credentials
Welcome - All elements appear correctly when user is logged in and has shared credentials
Welcome - Successful login advances to Teams
Welcome - Successful "login as" advances to Teams
Welcome - Successful login with another account advances to Teams
Welcome - Successful sign up advances to Teams
Welcome - Skip button advances to Teams when user is not logged in and has no shared credentials
Welcome - Skip button advances to Teams when user is not logged in and has shared credentials
Welcome - Skip button advances to Teams when user is logged in and has no shared credentials
Welcome - Skip button advances to Teams when user is logged in and has shared credentials
Welcome - Successful "login as" advances to Teams if logged in with no shared credentials
custom_preconds:
- A user is logged into the app
- A user does *not* have shared credentials
- Onboarding is triggered
custom_steps:
- Open the app
- Confirm "Continue with MLB button" is shown along with user's email address
- Tap continue with MLB
custom_expected: User should be taken to the teams page

title: Welcome -  "login as" shows error if user has invalid MLB credentials
custom_preconds:
- User has logged into an MLB app and has saved credentials
- User has logged into MLB.com and changed the password
custom_steps:
- Open the app
- Tap on the "Continue with MLB" button
custom_expected: User should see an alert notifying them that their credentials are incorrect

title: Fresh Install - Without Internet Connection
custom_preconds: Given a user has lost their internet connection, they can still get through onboarding after a fresh install
custom_steps:
*Fresh App launch
*No internet connection
custom_expected: User can successfully get through onboarding

title: Upgrade - Without Internet Connection
custom_preconds: Given a user has lost their internet connection, they can still get through onboarding after upgrading their app version
custom_steps:
*Upgrade major app version
*No internet connection
custom_expected: User can successfully get through onboarding

title: Profile overwrites favorite teams
custom_preconds:
- App has been deleted
- User has favorite and followed teams as part of their account
custom_steps: - Launch the app and login on the welcome screen
custom_expected: Teams should be populated with what is in the user's profile
